trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a spell, if it's the second creature spell you cast this turn, you may return CARDNAME from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: Whenever you cast a spell, if it's the second creature spell you cast this turn, you may return CARDNAME from your graveyard to the battlefield.

trans-unit.source: Leave but a shred of root and it will return, bursting with vigor.
trans-unit.target: Leave but a shred of root and it will return, bursting with vigor.

trans-unit.resname: WMC·2014 | Geist of Saint Traft | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking. Exile that token at end of combat.
trans-unit.target: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking. Exile that token at end of combat.

trans-unit.resname: WMC·2015 | Thalia, Guardian of Thraben | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Thraben is our home and I will not see it fall to this unhallowed horde."

trans-unit.source: Destroy target nonland permanent with mana value 3 or less.
trans-unit.target: Destroy target nonland permanent with mana value 3 or less.

trans-unit.source: The worst part isn't the pain, or the smell, or even the fear of death. It's hearing the clatter of bone on stone and knowing the bones are yours.
trans-unit.target: The worst part isn't the pain, or the smell, or even the fear of death. It's hearing the clatter of bone on stone and knowing the bones are yours.

WMC·2017 | Inkmoth Nexus | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}: CARDNAME becomes a 1/1 Phyrexian Blinkmoth artifact creature with flying and infect until end of turn. It's still a land. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
